column5: Take advantage of this pre-remodel rental special!!! This 3rd floor condo is clean and fully equipped with everything you need. My place is close to the beach, nightlife, and family-friendly activities. Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families with kids! Gorgeous view from huge sliding door windows. Please note that there are burners and a microwave - no stove. Who wants to cook on vacation, anyway?!!! Safe parking. Beautiful pool and hot tub!
column8: Beach View Condo Pre-Remodel Special Rate!!!
